author: ralexstokes
content:
we want the versioned hash construction in any case as it is likely the commitment scheme will change over time

this EIP is much simpler to ship if it is one thing to add to the EVM-level, rather than a set of precompiles like EIP-2537 so that would be the preferred path all other things being equal

i will separately bring up the bls precompiles on ACDs to see what appetite there is

author: bridge-bot
content: <dankrad> <@665236020312145930> in 4844 there are no DHTs, no rows/colums. Your questions are about full sharding
